channel.title: Loads of Reworks [Class Reworks and Suggestions]
channel.description:
Reworks and Class Ideas
Maid and Squire are from FoL with a few adjustments Noble as a pure Vote Manipulator Scribe to take on role of whispers, messages, and logs And Priest Revival to properly rework Psychic and Physician
But otherwise, please critique and enjoy!
I have combined the Phys, Priest, Psychic reworks with this thread. I'll refer the two threads to one another here.
**Social Reworks**
Psychic: Night Communication Noble: Vote Manipulation Priest: Dead Communication Scribe: Whisper and Message Manipulation Apostle: Vote, Whisper, Logs, and Dead Communication
[quote]
[color=blue]**The Psychic**[/color]
Unique Blue Dragon Social
(Converts to current Illusionist)
**_Passives_**
**Astral Medium:** Anyone connected to the Astral Network may talk to each other at night anonymously. If they are in jail, they cannot hear or speak. Passive remains even if class changes.
**_Abilities_**
**Focus Link:** (D) (2) If Alter Link is on a cooldown, you may reset the cooldown and use Alter Link tonight.
**Alter Link:** (N) (oo) (1C) Choose a player and connect them to the Astral Network. If they were already in it, remove them from the Astral Network. The Network has a maximum of 4 players at once. There is a 1 day cooldown.
[/quote]
[quote] [color=purple]**The Illusionist**[/color]
Unique Unseen Social
**_Passives_**
**Astral Medium:** Anyone connected to the Astral Network may talk to each other at night anonymously. If they are in jail, they cannot hear or speak. Passive remains even if class changes.
**Skilled Medium:** You can use both night abilities in the same night.
**_Abilities_**
**Focus Link:** (D) (2) If Alter Link is on a cooldown, you may reset the cooldown and use Alter Link tonight.
**Alter Link:** (N) (oo) (1C) Choose a player and connect them to the Astral Network. If they were already in it, remove them from the Astral Network. The Network has a maximum of 4 players at once. There is a 1 day cooldown.
**Mind Warp:** (N) (oo) Choose a player. They will receive incorrect feedback from their abilities tonight. [/quote]
[quote]
[color=blue]**The Scribe**[/color]
Blue Dragon Social
(Converts to Forger)
**_Passives_**
**_Abilities_**
**Regal Spy:** (D) (2) You will see the next four whispers to the King.
**Messenger:** (D) (2) You will send an anonymous message to the court.
**Documentation:** (N) (oo) Choose a player. You will see all whispers to and from them tomorrow.
[/quote]
[quote]
[color=purple]**The Forger**[/color]
Unseen Social
**_Passives_**
**_Abilities_**
**Regal Spy:** (D) (2) You will see the next four whispers to the King.
**Messenger:** (D) (2) You will send an anonymous message to the court.
**Documentation:** (N) (4) Choose a player. You will see all whispers to and from them tomorrow.
**Forge:** (N) (2) Look at a player's logs. If they die tonight, wipe their logs completely from the graveyard.
[/quote]
[quote]
[color=blue]**The Priest**[/color]
Unique Blue Dragon Social
(Converts to Animist)
**_Passives_**
**Call the Dead:** You are able to communicate with the dead at night.
**Holy Blessing:** You are night immune once.
**_Abilities_**
**Seance:** (D) (2) When dead, you may choose a player. You will talk with them freely tonight.
**Reanimate:** (N) (1) Revive a dead Blue Dragon player as a Death Knight.
**Necromancy:** (N) (oo) (1-Day Cooldown) Use an unlimited night ability of a dead Blue Dragon player.
[/quote]
[quote]
[color=purple]**The Animist**[/color]
(Anima is Latin for Soul, you got your Soulcatcher)
Unique Unseen Social
**_Passives_**
**Traitorous Call:** Enable the Unseen to communicate with dead Unseen members at night.
**_Abilities_*
**Mind Warp:** (N) (oo) Choose a player. They will get incorrect feedback from their abilities tonight.
**Burn Soul:** (N) (oo) Use a dead player's unlimited night ability. Killer and Special classes cannot be chosen.
[/quote]
[quote]
[color=blue]**The Noble**[/color]
Blue Dragon Social
(Converts to Aristocrat)
**_Passives_**
**Diplomacy:** You may use both your day abilities in the same day. You will see votes for trials cast in real-time.
**Royal Blood:** (Everyone knows what this is)
**_Abilities_**
**Political Pressure:** (D) (3) (Identical)
**Noble Twin:** (D) (3) (Also Identical)
**Order:** (N) (2) Prevent a player from accusing of treason or voting tomorrow.
**Bureaucrat:** (N) (oo) Give another player an extra vote for accusal tomorrow. (Does not show message)
[/quote]
[quote]
[color=purple]**The Aristocrat**[/color]
Unseen Social
**_Passives_**
**Diplomacy:** You may use both your day abilities in the same day.
**Royal Blood:** (Everyone knows what this is)
**_Abilities_**
**Political Pressure:** (D) (3) (Identical)
**Noble Twin:** (D) (3) (Also Identical)
**Order:** (N) (2) Prevent a player from accusing of treason or voting tomorrow.
**Bureaucrat:** (N) (oo) Give another player an extra vote for accusal tomorrow. (Does not show message)
[/quote]
[quote]
[color=red]**The Apostle**[/color]
Cult Social (Lower chance to spawn as Underling than Seeker, Invoker, Ritualist)
**_Passives_**
**Dark Words:** Allow the Cult to communicate with its dead members at night.
**_Abilities_**
**Discipled Power:** (D) (2) Force another player to accuse someone and you will have an extra vote for the next trial today.
**Snoop:** (D) (2) Choose a player. You will look at the contents of their logs.
**Dark Whispers:** (N) (oo) Choose a player. You will see all whispers to and from them tomorrow. You may not choose the King.
**Mind Warp:** (N) (oo) Choose a player. They will receive incorrect feedback from their abilities tonight and the next day.
[/quote]
**Killer Rework**
[quote]
[color=red]**The Acolyte**[/color]
Cult Killer (Lower chance to spawn as Underling than Seeker, Invoker, Ritualist)
**_Passives_**
**Blood Offering:** If you die because of bleed, the Cult Leader will gain an extra use of Eradicate.
**_Abilities_**
**Hemorrhage:** (D) (1) The Cult Leader's next Rupture will kill someone that night, not in two nights. The player will see that they are bleeding and hemorrhaged. The Cult Leader will be notified when Hemorrhage is activated.
**Transfusion:** (N) (3) Choose a player and protect them. Their attackers will die and you will begin to bleed at night. The attack bypasses night immunity.
**Crimson Curse:** (N) (1) Choose a player. If no one is currently bleeding, you will make them bleed. They will die in one night. Bypasses night immunity.
[/quote]
**Investigative Rework**
[quote]
[color=blue]**The Maid**[/color]
Blue Dragon Investigative
(Converts to Mistress) (Sorry but Waitress doesn't feel Medieval to me)
**_Passives_**
**_Abilities_**
**Service:** (D) (2) Choose a person and determine if they have Royal Blood.
**Escort:** (N) (2) Choose a player and determine their class type.
**Matchmake:** (N) (oo) Match two players together and see if they are compatible.
Parameters: - King and Fool are not compatible with anyone. Period. - Royals are not compatible with each other. - Classes are compatible with all other classes they can win with given that both classes are not Royals. - The Mercenary is compatible with her target.
[/quote]
[quote]
[color=purple]**The Mistress**[/color]
Unseen Investigative
**_Passives_**
**_Abilities_**
**Service:** (D) (2) Choose a person and determine if they have Royal Blood.
**Escort:** (N) (2) Choose a player and determine their class type.
**Matchmake:** (N) (oo) Match two players together and see if they are compatible.
[/quote]
**Support Reworks**
[quote] [color=blue]**The Physician**[/color]
Blue Dragon Support
(Converts to current Herbalist)
**_Passives_**
**Remedy Studies:** You are immune to poison and bleeding.
**_Abilities_**
**Heal:** (N) (oo) Heal someone tonight and cure them of poison and bleeding.
**Exhume:** (N) (4) Choose a dead player and determine their cause of death. [/quote]
[quote] [color=purple]**The Herbalist**[/color]
Unseen Offensive
**_Passives_**
**Remedy Studies:** You are immune to poison and bleeding.
**_Abilities_**
**Drug:** (N) (3) Make someone believe they were attacked and healed.
**Defile:** (N) (3) Choose a player and a class. If that player dies tonight, they will show up as that class.
[/quote]
[quote]
[color=blue]**The Baron**[/color]
Blue Dragon Support
(Converts to Duke)
_**Passives**_
**Royal Blood:** (Everyone should know what this is)
**Entitlement:** If you become the next King, you will keep your abilities alongside the abilities of succeeding Kings. (Not Starting King)
_**Abilities**_
**Royal Loan:** (N) (4) Choose another player. Any limited night ability they use tonight will not lose a charge when used.
Not included for both Baron and Duke: Prince's Execute if Prince killed Blue Dragon Reanimate (In whatever form)
**Kinship:** (D) (2) Choose any player and give them the Royal Blood passive if they do not have it. If that class already has two passives, they may not inherit Royal Blood.
[/quote]
[quote]
[color=purple]**The Duke**[/color]
Unseen Support
_**Passives**_
**Royal Blood:** (Everyone should know what this is)
**Entitlement:** If you become the next King, you will keep your abilities when you become King alongside a succeeding King's abilities.
_**Abilities**_
**Kinship:** (D) (1) Choose any player and give them the Royal Blood passive if they do not have it. If that class already has two passives, they may not inherit Royal Blood.
**Coup:** (N) (1) Make Assassin's attack tonight bypass heal and night immunity if it targets the King. (Not part of Entitlement passive when you become the King)
**Royal Loan:** (N) (3) Choose another player. Any limited night ability they use tonight will not lose a charge when used.
[/quote]
[quote]
[color=blue]**The Squire**[/color]
Blue Dragon Support
(Converts to Page)
**_Passives_**
**Unskilled:** You will be night immune once.
**Promotion:** (N) (oo) Choose a dead Blue Dragon player. If they are non-unique, you will become that class.
[/quote]
[quote]
[color=purple]**The Page**[/color]
Unseen Support
**_Passives_**
**Unskilled:** You will be night immune once.
**_Abilities_**
**Promotion:** (N) (oo) Choose a dead Blue Dragon player. If they are non-unique, you will become the converted version of that class.
[/quote]
**Offensive Suggestions**
[quote="NightX, post:1, topic:44469"] **The Merchant**
Neutral Offensive
(Converts to Crook)
**_Passives_**
**Haggler:** Immune to occupation and target change.
**_Abilities_**
**Pay Bail:** (D) (1) Make an accused player automatically be pardoned at the end of a trial. Can be overruled by King's Decide Fate before then.
**Sell Wares:** (N) (oo) Choose a player and occupy them.
**Advertise:** (N) (oo) Choose a player. All players who target you will be redirected to that player.
Goal: Survive to see the game reach Day 9. [/quote]
[quote] [color=purple]**The Crook**[/color]
Unseen Offensive
**_Passives_**
**Haggler:** Immune to occupation and target change.
**Cheapskate:** (N) (oo) Choose a player and occupy them. They cannot use day abilities tomorrow. Cannot target the King.
**Bribe:** (D) (2) Prevent the King from using Day Abilities today.
[/quote]
**Special Reworks**
[quote]
**The King**
Unknown Special
**_Passives_**
**Tenacity:** Immune to occupation, target change, and all accusals count as two.
**Loyal Subjects:** (Currently as is)
**_Abilities_**
**Guards:** (N) (4) (Currently as is)
**Order Execution:** (N) (2) (Not my favorite ability, but better than Allies by far) (Starting King only)
**Decide Fate:** (D) (1) Decide an accused player's fate.
**Royal Decree:** (D) (2) Make any player immune from being accused today. (Starting King only)
[/quote]

item.title: Loads of Reworks [Class Reworks and Suggestions]
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
Link Minds is just like Private Matter, just stuck to one person. There is such a thing as whispers you know.

Audicial Projection would give the class some uniqueness, but the limited uses hinders the number of times it would be used. Even though it does differentiate from Imprison, it still serves the same basic purpose even if it is more powerful.

I feel the desire to hang on to the Psychic is just inertia, and that doesn’t really help with anything. Prince serves the same purpose, even though it is a killer, and there is not much use for redundancy. While I think your version is better than the current one, I still think the solution is to completely change its purpose.

Read full topic
